00041 static wstring XMLChToWString(const XMLCh* const c1)
00042 {
00043         wstring s;
00044         int i=0;
00045         while (c1[i] != 0)
00046         {
00047                 s += c1[i];
00048                 ++i;
00049         }
00050         return s;
00051 }
00052 
00058 static bool operator==(const XMLCh* const &c1, wstring c2)
00059 {
00060         if (c2.length() != XMLString::stringLen(c1))
00061                 return false;
00062         for (int i=0; i<(int)c2.length(); i++)
00063         {
00064                 if (c2[i] != c1[i])
00065                         return false;
00066         }
00067         return true;
00068 }

00100 /*
00101  * Back up the current element.
00102  */
00103 void SAXParameterFileHandlers::endElement(const XMLCh* const name)
00104 {
00105         MoveCurrentElementBack(name);
00106 }
00107 
00108 /*
00109  * Back up the current element.
00110  */
00111 void SAXParameterFileHandlers::MoveCurrentElementBack(const XMLCh* const name)
00112 {
00113         if (name == 0)
00114                 return;
00115 
00116         if (name == PARAMETER_ELEMENT)
00117                 currentElement = PARAMETER_FILE;
00118 
00119         else if (name == IMPLEMENTATION_ELEMENT)
00120                 currentElement = PARAMETER_FILE;
00121 }
00122 
00123 /*
00124  * Advance the current element.
00125  */
00126 bool SAXParameterFileHandlers::MoveCurrentElementForward(const XMLCh* const name)
00127 {
00128         if (name == 0)
00129                 return false;
00130 
00131         if (name == PARAMETER_FILE_ELEMENT)
00132                 currentElement = PARAMETER_FILE;
00133 
00134         else if (name == IMPLEMENTATION_ELEMENT)
00135                 currentElement = IMPLEMENTATION;
00136 
00137         else if (name == PARAMETER_ELEMENT)
00138                 currentElement = PARAMETER;
00139 
00140         else
00141                 return false;
00142 
00143         return true;
00144 }
00145 
00146 /*
00147  * Set the current element based on the name and the current element.
00148  * Based on the current element, store the data in the array object.
00149  */
00150 void SAXParameterFileHandlers::startElement(const XMLCh* const name, AttributeList&  attributes)
00151 {
00152         if (MoveCurrentElementForward(name) == false)
00153                 return;
00154 
00155         map<wstring, wstring> atts;
00156         unsigned int len = attributes.getLength();
00157         for (unsigned int index = 0; index < len; index++)
00158         {
00159                 atts[XMLChToWString(attributes.getName(index))] = XMLChToWString(attributes.getValue(index));
00160         }
00161 
00162         switch (currentElement)
00163         {
00164         case PARAMETER_FILE:
00165                 StoreParameterFileAttributes(atts);
00166                 break;
00167 
00168         case IMPLEMENTATION:
00169                 StoreImplementationAttributes(atts);
00170                 break;
00171 
00172         case PARAMETER:
00173                 StoreParameterAttributes(atts);
00174                 break;
00175 
00176         default:
00177                 break;
00178         }
00179 }

00186 }

00188 /*
00189  * Store the parameter attributes.
00190  */
00191 void SAXParameterFileHandlers::StoreParameterAttributes(map<wstring, wstring> &attributes)
00192 {
00193     ParameterType param;
00194 
00195     param.name = attributes[PARAMETER_NAME_ATTRIBUTE];
00196     param.index = attributes[PARAMETER_INDEX_ATTRIBUTE];
00197     param.displayName = attributes[PARAMETER_DISPLAY_NAME_ATTRIBUTE];
00198     param.category = attributes[PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE];
00199     param.isEditable = attributes[PARAMETER_ISEDITABLE_ATTRIBUTE];
00200     param.type = attributes[PARAMETER_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE];
00201     param.currentValue = attributes[PARAMETER_CURVALUE_ATTRIBUTE];
00202     param.minValue = attributes[PARAMETER_MINVALUE_ATTRIBUTE];
00203     param.maxValue = attributes[PARAMETER_MAXVALUE_ATTRIBUTE];
00204     param.defaultValue = attributes[PARAMETER_DEFVALUE_ATTRIBUTE];
00205     param.precision = attributes[PARAMETER_PRECISION_ATTRIBUTE];
00206     param.maxLength = attributes[PARAMETER_MAXLENGTH_ATTRIBUTE];
00207     param.description = attributes[PARAMETER_DESC_ATTRIBUTE];
00208         
00209     parameterFileData->Parameters().push_back(param);
00210 }
00211 
00212 /*
00213  * Store the implementation attributes.
00214  */
00215 void SAXParameterFileHandlers::StoreImplementationAttributes(map<wstring, wstring> &attributes)
00216 {
00217     parameterFileData->ImplementationAttributes().name = attributes[IMPLEMENTATION_NAME_ATTRIBUTE];
00218     parameterFileData->ImplementationAttributes().version = attributes[IMPLEMENTATION_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE];
00219     parameterFileData->ImplementationAttributes().executableFileName = attributes[IMPLEMENTATION_EXE_FILE_NAME_ATTRIBUTE];
00220     parameterFileData->ImplementationAttributes().description = attributes[IMPLEMENTATION_DESC_ATTRIBUTE];
00221 }
00222 
00223 /*
00224  * Store the parameter file attributes
00225  */
00226 void SAXParameterFileHandlers::StoreParameterFileAttributes(map<wstring, wstring> &attributes)
00227 {
00228     parameterFileData->ParameterFileAttributes().company = attributes[PARAMETER_FILE_COMPANY_ATTRIBUTE];
00229     parameterFileData->ParameterFileAttributes().userName = attributes[PARAMETER_FILE_USER_NAME_ATTRIBUTE];
00230     parameterFileData->ParameterFileAttributes().contentVersion = attributes[PARAMETER_FILE_CONTENT_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE];
00231 }
